feed.title: Roadini Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Roadini news and events.

entry.title: Service Oriented Architectures are Awful
entry.summary:
We start this week by taking a step back and getting a good look into the state of our project. We knew the objective of the course was to build a project with a Service Oriented Approach to the problem. With that in mind we start by giving each other a task or better said a Service.

After a whole week has passed on which each one of us worked on his Service, there it was, the time to talk, to gather around and see the state of our project.

Fu**!

entry.title: The Initial Work Plan
entry.summary: In the class of service engineering, the objective is to develop an idea who follows and Service Oriented Architectures approach, therefore, we start to break our idea in services and distributing this services to the team. Our principal modules are:

entry.title: The next big thing
entry.summary:
First of all Hello!,

Before I tell you guys the early begin of the project I will present our team, at the time of this post, the team are all students of Computer and Telematics Engineering:
